name: Espresso
description: Intense, rich coffee with a strong flavor and aroma. Perfect for a quick energy boost.

name: Latte
description: Smooth blend of espresso and steamed milk, topped with foam. Ideal for a sweet, gentle coffee experience.

name: Drink Chocolate
description: Rich, creamy cocoa drink perfect for cold days. Enjoy with whipped cream topping.

name: Loose Tea
description: Authentic tea flavors brewed from selected tea leaves. Offers a rich tea-drinking experience.

name: Croissant
description: Traditional French pastry with flaky layers and buttery softness. Perfect for breakfast or snacks.

name: Coffee Beans
description: Select roasted coffee beans for home brewing. From strong to mild, catering to true coffee lovers.
